command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user tzGyVcj9oHnaUv9.3cfa47fa1e17 --database bQwuvX7ycRD88MLXJHLZXd --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE purchase_orders
messages: `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
stdout:
Table	Create Table
purchase_orders	CREATE TABLE `purchase_orders` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `poNumber` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `vendorId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `orderDate` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `shipDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `expectedDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `receivedDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'pending',
  `subtotal` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Cents',
  `shippingCost` int(11) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Cents',
  `tax` int(11) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Cents',
  `totalAmount` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Cents',
  `paymentMethod` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `paymentStatus` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'unpaid',
  `paidDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `shipToName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `shipToAddress` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `shipToCity` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `shipToState` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `shipToZip` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `shipToCountry` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'USA',
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `internalNotes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `emailThreadId` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_po_number` (`poNumber`),
  KEY `idx_vendor` (`vendorId`),
  KEY `idx_status` (`status`),
  KEY `idx_order_date` (`orderDate`),
  UNIQUE KEY `poNumber` (`poNumber`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
